name: Lucy's Land
description:
"One of these alien fucks crushed my dear Lucy and took her body. I just want her back. Please help me. We have to deactivate the five generators spread across my land to open the door in the cave."

Lucy's Land is a first person exploration game set in a dream-like, countryside. Jude and his fiancée Lucy lived way out in the middle of nowhere. She was the first one to see the blue blinking lights the night that the alien's landed. Jude needs to deactivate the five generators to open a door to the cave. He hopes thats where they are holding Lucy's body. Will you help him get her back? 

Follow me on twitter for future game news: https://twitter.com/Hcup86
